About Lifetime Home Services

Expert home solutions you can trust, backed by decades of experience

Our Story

Since 1999, Lifetime Home Services has been the trusted name in home health, safety, and improvement solutions across the Midwest. What started as a small family business has grown into a comprehensive home services company, serving thousands of satisfied customers across Wisconsin, Illinois, Minnesota, and Colorado.

We believe every home deserves to be safe, healthy, and beautiful. That's why we've expanded our expertise to cover the most critical aspects of home maintenance and improvement – from protecting your family's health with professional radon services to enhancing your home's efficiency with advanced duct sealing technology.

Our Values

Quality First

We use only the highest-quality materials and proven techniques to ensure lasting results.

Transparency

Clear communication, honest pricing, and detailed explanations of all our work.

Customer Focus

Your satisfaction is our priority. We're not done until you're completely happy.

Expertise

Continuous training and certification ensure we stay at the forefront of our industry.

Our experienced team of certified professionals

What We Do

Radon Services

Comprehensive radon testing and mitigation services to protect your family from this invisible threat. Our certified professionals use state-of-the-art equipment and proven techniques.

Duct Cleaning & Sealing

Revolutionary Aeroseal technology and professional duct cleaning services to improve your home's air quality and energy efficiency.

Floor Coatings

Durable, beautiful epoxy floor coatings for garages, basements, and commercial spaces. Transform your floors with long-lasting protection and style.

Custom Storage Solutions

Through our Closet Concepts division, we design and install custom storage solutions that maximize space and enhance organization.

Why Choose Lifetime Home Services?

Licensed & Insured

Fully licensed and insured for your peace of mind. We carry comprehensive liability and workers' compensation insurance.

Certified Professionals

Our technicians are certified by industry organizations and receive ongoing training on the latest techniques and safety protocols.

Warranty Protection

All our work is backed by comprehensive warranties. We stand behind our craftsmanship and materials.

24/7 Emergency Support

Home emergencies don't wait for business hours. Our emergency support line is available around the clock.

Free Estimates

No-obligation, detailed estimates for all our services. You'll know exactly what to expect before we begin.

Financing Available

Flexible financing options make it easy to invest in your home's health, safety, and value.

Visit Our Showroom

See our work firsthand at our state-of-the-art showroom and training facility. We showcase the latest in floor coating finishes, storage solutions, and home improvement technologies.
